attributes.review:
I was super excited to download this app but the Radical Left has a history of hacking and being associated with hackers and knowing there hate for are beloved president, there probably using this to collect are phone numbers and data.
We should give this a 1 star rating right off the bat to make sure they don’t have the chance to steal are identity’s and screw up the election
attributes.title: Be Careful!

attributes.review:
I was really excited to get this app so I could learn more about my lord and savior ✨Cheeto boy✨. Unfortunately as soon as I downloaded it the FBI showed up at my door asking all these questions. They weren’t even nice about it just barged right in and ripped me from my bed. It was just so rude! Anyway definitely do not recommend.

✨ 🧚🏿💞had to delete🥺✨🧚🏼💞but umm try yourself next time✨💞🧚🏼
attributes.title: Cheeto boy

attributes.review: Downloaded this app because I wanted to prove to my libtard friends that trump is an American hero, but the app just kept giving me notifications that some dude called Joffrey Edsteen wanted me to give our president a massage, so I tried to sign up cause who doesn’t want 75 year old man meat under their hands? But then when I entered my age it said I was too old. I’m pretty confused.
attributes.title: Little confused but I LOVE AMURICA

attributes.review: Love this App!  Like having the real news and real time events.  Love that you can shop and donate securely.  Engage and invite people to the App and build points!  President Trump 2020 ❤️
attributes.title: Inside Track

attributes.review: Just found out that this app sells your information to liberal socialists?? Why is no one else mad about this? I thought if there is one place my information would be safe it would be here but I was wrong. Please please don’t fall for this trap it’s just an attempt for the government to steal your information and market it to Democrats!
attributes.title: Sells your information?!?!?

attributes.review: I hated this app, now I know what you’re thinking oh this is just another liberal writing a review for an app that has nothing to do with them, but trust me, as a 50-year-old white conservative I do not trust this app. I completely sent my phone into overdrive after 30 minutes. I’m currently writing this on a new phone that cost $1000. Do not download this app!!
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone kept buzzing and overheated and it’s not worth it at all DONT even think about downloading it it’s a complete waste of time. My phone turned off and wouldn’t come back on immediately after opening the app and I had to spend $300 to get it fixed ALL because of this app
attributes.title: Furious

attributes.review: I am warning you do NOT get this app. As soon as I downloaded it Donald J Trump and Ellen Degeneres stormed into my house and ATE my dog, all while singing A cappella style don’t stop me now by queen. Not only that but the worst part is it takes up a lot of storage. Do not download, please, I am risking a lot just submitting this review. Donald if you are reading this please return my light up Garfield onesie. Thank you.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: STOP! Fellow Trump supporters DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I was really excited to get this app and have a place to access everything MAGA! But when I tried to download it my phone started spewing nazi propaganda! And then it flashed like strobe lights. But the craziest part of all this is that 3 days later when the apple fixed my phone the app still wasn’t done downloading!!!!!! This must be a hack by the DEMOCRAT SNOWFLAKES!
attributes.title: STOP!
